attributes.action: Petition to allow students to use the restroom during class.
attributes.additional_details: Schools don’t allow students to use the toilet during class. If a young girl was on her period and the school do not let her, it is causing her pain, uncomfort and its unhygienic. It is a normal human right to use the bathroom when needed and it’s strictly taken from students unless they have a medical problem. Prisoners have more toilet rights than student and alot of people find this absolutely horrendous! It needs to be sorted so i made this petition to help student out.
attributes.background: Help students out by allowing students to use the restroom if needed during class hours.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This is a matter for individual schools and teachers. Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
